root['Desc'].new_value: Increases the wearer's Max HP by [30|60]%. When the wearer or their memosprite loses HP during their own turn, the wearer gains 'Death Flower,' which allows the wearer and their memosprite to ignore [30|50]% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG, lasting for 2 turn(s). When the wearer's memosprite disappears, advances the wearer's action by [12|24]%. This effect can only trigger up to 1 time, and the trigger count resets every time the wearer uses Ultimate.
